value.title: Three Uses For Artificial Intelligence In Financial Services In 2024
value.excerpt: From boardrooms to classrooms to dining tables, 2023 made AI the hottest topic in virtually all corners of enterprise, education and private life. It's not even an exaggeration to say that A and I were the two most important letters of the year; in fact, Collins Dictionary recently made it Word of the Year 2023.
